data.message: Oh and by the way I do not get an acceptable answer when I try to find out what is going on with my account.

replies.message: Hi James. This is a great place to ask questions. How can we help? -Hannah
Unlock my account so I can post some more pics for my friends to enjoy.

Fb expects me to open a new account which I did but then I lost all my post and photos. I told my friends on my old account if they got a friends request from me to ignore it so most of them are lost.

Hey James. If your account is currently locked, you can try to get access by logging into your account and trying to complete the security check from the computer or mobile phone that you usually use to log into Facebook. Unfortunately, if you're unable to log in and complete the security check on your own, you'll have to send us an acceptable form of ID. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2gQcKpA. -Hannah
Facebook  I've checked all my settings also ...... LEAVE FACEBOOK ALONE making it better is not working otherwise I will be dropping of as if you care !?
I have sent a scan of my drivers license twice and it still doesn't get resolved.
